values:
so... how long had it been? like fucking forever. even though i never have a damn thing ot say but ill try it gain. haha. anyways.lets see.. lifes so great now for obvuious reasons. if i figure them out ill let you know too ok?ok. anyways.wahts new? i broke up with alyssa anmd thats basically it.im a free man now and its amazing.,(trust me, i know)but yeah i guess that it so i will have mor eot say next time. lets hope so anyways. later


rob

yeah. i am so fucking excited that ive gottern to ride the last two days in a row. fucking amazing.howie manages to get hurt both days but still, riding is a plus.haha.anyways.last nite(saturday)fucking sucked.well,there was high points and and shitty times. it was good because i was with people i can talk to,like howie, jon, alex and,of course, my baby, alyssa.i love her.regardless.then the nite got a little worse. i had some fat whore that thinks i am the worlds greatest asshole, bowl next to me.how fucking great.not!anyways.im out peeps

so today was one month for me and my baby girl, alyssa. god i love her and the more i realize whats going on around me....the more i love her.i hope we last a million more months. seriously. anyways. tonite was amazing.i hope tomorrow turns out as good as every other day with her.well another thing is if anyone ever needs me for anyhthing, im here. for some reason lateley ive been helping alot of people and i dont mind at all. let me know whatever comes up. i will always be here for all of you. no matter how bad you fucked with me or how bad you thinki amy hate you i will still be here. well anyways thats my sarry ass story for today. lata peeps. im outie.
rob

hi. so. yeah. i am just inshock right now because tomorrow is definaltley one month for me and alyssa!(i know its not a big deal to anyone else but it is to me)anyways, yesterday was quite boring. i did the same things i do everyother day, wake up, shower, eat, sit at my computer all day, wait for someone to wanna do something and then go terortize the citty in a peice of shit wagon with some stupid kid. anyways, thats prolly what ill end up doing today anyways so its cool.but.. yeah.. i dunno what else to say so im out. lata peeps
rob

aly..wow girl, i love you

so yesterday fucking blew and it looks like today is going to be the same. oh well, ill be aight. i hate the fact that there is so much drama involved with being online. people seriously are gay. why cant they say say the shit that is said on here to your face? im not pointing fingers but i think its rediculous. oh well. one more thing. i want to apoligize to everyone who thinks that ia m a dick head or an ass hole or what ever other degrating name you can come up with. so im sorry! anyways, better topic. umm.idk..haha. oh well. i guess im outie then peeps. later

so tell me something? does the whole fucking world have it out for me or what. am i just not ever supposed to see the the one person in my life who i can trust and love at the same time?i gues not. antways this is how my day went
1st: we went to the mall and didnt eat because she didnt feel good, not her fault and i wasnt hungary anyways
2nd: we went bowling and everything was fine until her mom called because she didnt think we were really there. bull shit
3rd:to top it of we are still at the bowling alley and her mom calls again and decided to tell alyssa she neded to come home............god i hate people

alyssa: i love you and we will get through this, nothing will come between us.. ever!
